ProjectDetails.title: Torque Craft
ProjectDetails.headline: Fueling Passion for Car Enthusiasts
ProjectDetails.summary: Designed a bold and energetic frontend for an automotive brand selling high-performance parts and accessories.

client.name: Torque Craft
client.description: A brand focused on delivering quality car parts and accessories for enthusiasts and professionals.

duration.description: Detailed project to capture the brand's powerful and high-quality essence.

timeline.description: From concept to final implementation, focusing on a immersive user experience.

challenge: Creating a design that feels powerful and premium
Showcasing a variety of products in an exciting way
Appealing to car enthusiasts with a passion for quality
solution: A dark-themed, high-contrast design with bold accents
Dynamic animations and a strong visual impact
Sections built to highlight featured products and categories

Results.summary: The design successfully captures the energy and premium quality of the Torque Craft brand.
Results.resultCompany: We built an immersive online experience that gets car enthusiasts excited.
